Welcome

The DeltaWerken documentation will provide you information about the available DeltaWerken delta 3D-printer DIY projects.

The documentation is still a work in progress so keep in mind it’s not complete.

Getting started

There is currenly one project that is available:

  • [DeltaWerken Super Racer][Super Racer]

Discord

We’re a big Discord advocate! We love using it and building a community. Missing something in the documentation, need assistance, share your adventure, or enjoy a nice community? Join our Discord today!
